评论详情: I have the worst luck finding suitable and affordable sunglasses. I ordered these from a fashion influencer's blog. Wow. They are pretty fashion forward. Very nice. Best features are the color of the lenses and the sturdiness of the frames. They dont tilt either. They are def a high quality item for the price. What a great value. Just a side note: I ordered another pair of sunglasses from a different manufacturer and from a different fashion blogger. Within 2 days, the other other pair of sunglasses started tilting. And within a week, the lense broke out of one of the sides. The frame was cheap. So when I say that these 2 sunglasses from this manufacturer are a great find for the money, I truly mean it. Buy them! Btw, the packaging is also high quality. Enjoy!

类型: Color: C2-polarized Yellow Lens/ Black Frame
评论详情: I've used these yellow shade glasses for driving at night for many years, and then just started wearing them all the time even in the day. The gas station glasses are easy to get and it's doesn't matter when it breaks our gets scratched, but the gas station pugs are getting more and more expensive, so I decided to look to find a good quality pair and these are it!! The look is fantastic, the quality and build is much better than the gas station variety, AND these are polarized which is so much better while driving at night, and can truly be worn day and night. Now I don't just look like I'm on a road trip but look like I'm on my way to a party everywhere I go. It comes with a cloth pouch, a cloth to clean, and a small card to check the polarize glasses.

类型: Color: C2-polarized Yellow Lens/ Black Frame

类型: Color: C2-polarized Yellow Lens/ Black Frame
评论详情: I'm thrilled with these sunglasses! Like, legit over the moon. I've been wanting a pair of designer aviators that look very similar but are entirely out of my budget right now. I'm so happy I found these instead and took a chance on getting them. The fit is amazing and the quality is excellent. I got the black ones with the yellow lenses and they're exactly as pictured. They feel sturdy so they're not going to break. I normally take good care of my sunglasses so I'll probably keep these in the bag that they came with. There's also a dust cloth included and a tag with little patch test to see if the glasses are polarized.  I love how the brown ones look in the pictures so I may come back for those! Don't hesitate to purchase these!!
